**Helpful tips for using WhoseEgg**

- WhoseEgg may be used on any device with a browser, but we recommend using a computer for the best experience

- Zoom in and out using control (Windows) or command (Mac) and the + key (or the compatible technique on user's computer)

- Figures in the app can be saved by right clicking on the image and selecting an option to save the the image
